page.title: 14Children's leisure
page.content: We asked some 9_10 year old children in class L.C.8 at Gilthwaites First School what their{'out of school' {spare time}activites are.Here are some: (a)Reading (b)Collecting Postage Stamps, Decorative or Humourous Posters & Stickers or Postcards (c) Playing Card Games (d) Musical Instruments (e) Playing Records or Cassette tapes (f) Computer games (g) Sports including football,tennis, snooker, cycling, horse-riding and swimming (h) Breakdancing - also done in school, a vigorous form of street dancing with elaborate body movements. Every member of the class goes swimming & does homework sometimes.{Many of our children do {these things before school:-}read,feed & walk pets, watch T.V or video, play computer games sometimes starting at 6.30am.Most children go to bed at 9pm.
